titleStmt.title: SII 8.96: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 96. (A.R. No. 506 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīrājarājadevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 6vatu Uṭaiyār tiruvaṇṇāmalai
uṭaiya nāyaṉār koyil ciUruttira cimāhecurarum cimāhecurak kaṇkāṇi ceyvārum tāṉapatimāhe
curarum tevakaṉmikaḷuṅ koyiṟkaṇakkarum tiyākacamuttirapaṭṭai cittamaracar tikkāṉaipperumāḷukku
kal veṭṭikkuṭutta paricāvatu . Aṇṇānāṭṭil kaḷamuḻārpūṇṭi Eri Etirvāyil Ittikkāṉaipperumāḷ kāṇiyā
kac caṇṭecurapperuvilaiyākak koṇṭu Eri veṭṭiṉa tikkāṉaipperumāḷnallūṟku kaṭamai koḷḷumiṭattu tiru
ttiṉa vāṇṭu kuḻināḻi koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum Itaṉ piṟṟaiyāṇṭu kuḻināḻiyum pāṭi kāvalum koḷḷakkaṭavatāka
vum Itaṉ piṟṟaiyāṇṭumutal Ellāvāṇṭum pāṭikāvaluḷpaṭa nūṟukuḻikku mukkaleṉa tūṇippatakku nelluk koḷḷakka
ṭavatākavum kārceyta nilattukku nūṟukuḻikku mukkalanelluk koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum vari yantarāyam koḷḷakkaṭavatallavāka
vum Iṉṉilattāluḷḷa kaṭamai Uṭaiyāṟku tirumeṟpūccuk kuṭalāvitākavum Ivverikkut teṟkum vaṭakkum Irupatiṉkala varaku
vitai Ivaṟku kāṇiyākap puṉcainilamum viṭṭu Ippaṭikku kal veṭṭikkuṭuttom Ivvaṉaivom . Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 8.96 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
